products.name: Classic Cheeseburger
products.description: A juicy beef patty with melted cheddar cheese, fresh lettuce, tomato, and onions in a soft burger bun.

products.name: Paneer Tikka Burger
products.description: Grilled paneer tikka with mint chutney, onions, and fresh tomato in a whole wheat bun.

products.name: Peri Peri Chicken Burger
products.description: Fiery peri peri chicken fillet with spicy mayo, lettuce, and onions in a toasted bun.

products.name: BBQ Bacon Burger
products.description: Smoky bacon, BBQ sauce, crispy onions, and melted cheese on a juicy beef patty.

products.name: Crispy Veggie Burger
products.description: Crispy vegetable patty with lettuce, tomato, and tangy mayo in a soft sesame bun.

products.name: Spicy Mexican Burger
products.description: Spiced beef patty with jalapeños, nacho chips, spicy salsa, and cheddar cheese.

products.name: Mushroom Swiss Burger
products.description: Juicy beef patty with sautéed mushrooms and melted Swiss cheese in a toasted bun.

products.name: Aloo Tikki Burger
products.description: Classic Indian-style aloo tikki with tangy tamarind chutney and fresh veggies.

products.name: Margherita Pizza
products.description: Classic Margherita pizza with fresh basil, mozzarella cheese, and a tangy tomato sauce base.

products.name: Pepperoni Pizza
products.description: Spicy pepperoni slices layered over gooey mozzarella and a crispy crust.

products.name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
products.description: BBQ chicken with onions, jalapeños, and a smoky BBQ sauce drizzle on a crispy thin crust.

products.name: Chocolate Brownie
products.description: Rich and fudgy chocolate brownie served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

products.name: Strawberry Cheesecake
products.description: Creamy cheesecake topped with fresh strawberry sauce and whipped cream.

products.name: Tiramisu
products.description: Italian coffee-flavored dessert with layers of mascarpone and cocoa powder.

products.name: Alfredo Pasta
products.description: Creamy Alfredo sauce with fettuccine pasta and parmesan cheese.

products.name: Penne Arrabbiata
products.description: Spicy red sauce pasta with garlic, chili flakes, and fresh basil.

products.name: Chicken Pesto Pasta
products.description: Grilled chicken tossed in basil pesto sauce with linguine pasta.

products.name: Mango Smoothie
products.description: Refreshing mango smoothie made with fresh mango pulp and yogurt.

products.name: Lemon Iced Tea
products.description: Chilled lemon-infused iced tea with a hint of mint.

products.name: Cold Coffee
products.description: Iced coffee blended with milk, sugar, and topped with chocolate syrup.

products.name: Grilled Salmon
products.description: Freshly grilled salmon served with garlic butter and steamed vegetables.

products.name: Prawn Tempura
products.description: Crispy battered prawns served with a sweet chili dipping sauce.

products.name: Lobster Thermidor
products.description: Lobster baked in a creamy cheese sauce with herbs and white wine.
